main event: A witness in Dalton, Massachusetts reported seeing a star-like object in the sky on October 6, 1966 that would move up and down and disappear, reappearing again.
interesting points: The witness saw the object every night from October 6th to October 15th, 1966, except for one or two cloudy nights.
The object would move from horizon to horizon and appeared to take off and suddenly stop.
The witness reported the sighting to the police on October 6, 1966.
The Air Force responded, requesting more information and indicating they could not make a meaningful evaluation without essential data like size, elevation, and flight characteristics.
The witness described the object as star-like, with a bright red and white color, that would appear to rise up, drop down, and then suddenly stop.
witnesses: Civilian witness, a 30-year-old female registered nurse
